name: browser.js
short_description:
browser.js is a Javascript library to detect specifics concerning the users browser.

Instead of trying to figure out yourself what every browser yourself, get a nice array layout of properties using browser.js.

The project isn't public yet. The website is not yet complete and will now take you to the projects main website as the development website is under construction.

The following web browsers can be detected using the script. Note that this is a Technical Alpha and the gap for error is huge.

Google Chrome (all versions)
Firefox
Internet Explorer (10 and 11) (Work in progress for all versions)
Safari
Opera
Maxthon
summary: A Javascript library to detect various browser properties
